title_en: Breaking News! Apple-Google Siri Partnership Could Be Worth $5 Billion Annually?!
summary_en:
â€¢ Apple's deal to leverage Google's Gemini for a revamped Siri may be significantly more beneficial to Google than previously thought.
â€¢ An analysis by Deepwater Asset Management suggests the deal could be worth up to $5 billion annually.
â€¢ The contract is estimated to last through 2030, indicating a long-term partnership.
content_en:
New information has surfaced suggesting that Apple's integration of Google's Gemini to enhance Siri could generate up to $5 billion in annual revenue for Google. According to an analysis by Gene Munster of Deepwater Asset Management, this figure significantly exceeds the previously reported estimate of $1 billion from Bloomberg's Mark Gurman. The agreement encompasses the use of Gemini in Apple's on-device Foundation Models as well, and is projected to continue through 2030 due to its broad scope. This partnership is expected to dramatically improve Siri's AI capabilities while also serving as a significant revenue stream for Google's Gemini. Further developments will be closely watched.

title_en: Intel Arc B770 Test Samples Not Supplied to AIBs? Clouds Gathering Over Battlemage Plan?
summary_en:
â€¢ It has been revealed that Intel Arc B770 test samples have not yet been provided to major AIB partners.
â€¢ Final specifications have also not been distributed, raising concerns about the product's release timing.
â€¢ Sources suggest that testing of the boards is currently limited to Intel labs, potentially delaying preparations for mass production.
content_en:
Recent reports indicate that Intel's next-generation GPU, the Arc B770, has not yet been provided to major Add-in Board (AIB) partners for testing. According to multiple sources, the final specifications have also not been distributed, creating uncertainty regarding the product's release schedule. One source stated that board evaluation is currently limited to Intel's internal labs, with no confirmed timeline for sample distribution to AIB partners. Typically, AIB partners require a significant lead time to prepare for mass production, suggesting a potential delay in the Arc B770's launch. Combined with the absence of 'Battlemage' at CES 2026, this raises concerns about Intel's GPU strategy.

Review (EN)

Uh oh, this is concerning. The Arc B770 was hyped as a high-end Battlemage card, but no samples to AIBs suggests development is hitting roadblocks. Come on, Intel, you can do it!

title_en: Opera One R3: Revolutionary Multitasking with Music-Reactive UI and 4-Way Split Screen!
summary_en:
â€¢ Opera One R3 introduces an animated UI theme that reacts to music playing in the browser.
â€¢ The AI assistant utilizes architecture from Opera's Neon browser, resulting in a 20% speed increase.
â€¢ Split-screen mode has been expanded to support up to four tabs, enabling more efficient multitasking.
content_en:
Opera One R3 has been released. This update introduces a new feature where the UI dynamically animates in response to music, providing a visually engaging browsing experience. The AI assistant benefits from adopting the architecture of Opera's experimental Neon browser, resulting in a 20% increase in response speed. Furthermore, the AI operates within the context of specific tabs or tab groups, preventing information confusion between different browsing sessions. YouTube integration has also been enhanced, allowing the AI to analyze videos to locate specific moments or summarize content. Split-screen mode has been expanded to support up to four tabs, with various display options such as horizontal and grid layouts. The Tab Islands feature now allows for color-coding and naming of related tabs, making organization easier. Gmail and Google Calendar integration have been added to the sidebar, alongside continued support for existing messaging apps and music services. Opera is discontinuing the separate beta browser build in favor of an 'early bird mode' toggle within the main browser. These new features collectively position Opera One R3 as a more powerful and flexible browsing experience.

Review (EN)

The music-reactive UI is a game-changer! It feels like your browser is dancing with your music. The AI improvements & 4-way split screen are seriously impressive. Opera is pushing boundaries!

review_en: Absolutely stunning specs! Apple partnering with Google's Gemini was a completely unexpected move. I'm incredibly excited to see how Siri evolves. The future of Apple's AI strategy is about to change dramatically!
title_en: Breaking News! Apple and Google Finalize $5 Billion Gemini Partnership! What Does This Mean for Siri's Future?
summary_en:
â€¢ Apple has decided to adopt Google's Gemini models for Siri and Apple Intelligence.
â€¢ Analysts predict this partnership will be a cloud computing contract worth approximately $5 billion.
â€¢ The integration with OpenAI may diminish in the long term, potentially bringing significant changes to Apple's AI strategy.
content_en:
Apple has announced its adoption of Google's Gemini models as the foundational technology for Siri and Apple Intelligence. According to reports from the Financial Times, this partnership is structured as a multi-billion dollar cloud computing contract, with analyst Gene Munster estimating the total payment to Google could reach $5 billion. This echoes a similar deal made two decades ago, where Google's search engine became the default on Apple devices, generating approximately $20 billion in annual revenue for Apple at the time. Apple stated that it determined Gemini provides the â€œmost capable foundation,â€ but the integration with existing ChatGPT will continue for now. However, Munster is skeptical about the long-term prospects of ChatGPT, believing that operating two large models in parallel would not be economically sensible for Apple. Furthermore, OpenAI consciously decided not to become a custom model provider for Apple last autumn, choosing to focus on developing its own AI devices. This hardware development effort is led by former Apple design chief Jony Ive, and Munster suggests this personnel change may have also impacted the Apple-OpenAI relationship. Apple's investment in Gemini is relatively conservative compared to other major tech companies. While Google, Microsoft, Amazon, and Meta have invested hundreds of billions of dollars in AI data centers since the launch of ChatGPT, Apple has kept its physical infrastructure investment in AI to around 3% of its revenue. Financial Times analysis shows Apple's capital expenditure for fiscal 2025 is $12.7 billion, compared to Google's expected $90 billion investment this year. A former Apple executive stated that the Google deal was â€œa necessary byproduct of Appleâ€™s decision not to â€˜go bigâ€™ on its AI investments like its competitors.â€ The next-generation Siri is expected to be introduced with iOS 26.4, likely to be released to the public in March or April 2026.

Review (EN)

Absolutely stunning specs! Apple partnering with Google's Gemini was a completely unexpected move. I'm incredibly excited to see how Siri evolves. The future of Apple's AI strategy is about to change dramatically!

title_en: 007 First Light PC Specs Revised! IO Interactive Acknowledges Initial Misinformation
summary_en:
â€¢ The PC system requirements for '007 First Light' have been revised following feedback from the community.
â€¢ The RAM requirement has been corrected from 32GB to 16GB, and VRAM values have also been updated.
â€¢ IO Interactive plans to share further performance targets closer to launch.
content_en:
IO Interactive today announced an update to the PC system requirements for '007 First Light'. This follows community feedback highlighting inconsistencies in a previously released list. The initial error was attributed to internal miscommunication, resulting in an older version of the specifications being shared. Following thorough re-examination and additional testing, the recommended RAM has been corrected from 32GB to 16GB, VRAM values have been updated, and the minimum CPU requirement has been revised. IO Interactive plans to share further performance targets closer to launch. The company apologized for the confusion and expressed gratitude to those who brought the issue to their attention. The updated specifications are now live on their store pages, and they look forward to sharing more about '007 First Light' as launch approaches.

Review (EN)

Glad to see the specs were corrected! 32GB RAM felt excessive, 16GB is much more reasonable. IO Interactive's quick response is impressive. Can't wait for launch!

title_en: BREAKING: Dark Fantasy Strategy RPG 'Disciples: Domination' Release Date Set for February 12, 2026! Pre-orders Now Open!
summary_en:
â€¢ The release date for 'Disciples: Domination' has been announced as February 12, 2026.
â€¢ The Standard Edition will be available for â‚¬49.99 / $49.99, and the Deluxe Edition for â‚¬59.99 / $59.99.
â€¢ Pre-ordering will unlock the Corruption Skins Pack.
content_en:
Kalypso Media and Artefacts Studio have announced the release of the dark fantasy strategy RPG 'Disciples: Domination' on February 12, 2026. The game features turn-based combat, allowing players to expand their forces on the battlefield of Nevendaar. The Standard Edition is priced at â‚¬49.99 / $49.99, and the Deluxe Edition at â‚¬59.99 / $59.99. Pre-ordering either edition will grant access to the Corruption Skins Pack, a set of cosmetic items imbued with the corrupted mana flowing through Nevendaar. Strategy RPG fans should definitely take note!

Review (EN)

A February 2026 release is a bit far off, but the dark fantasy strategy RPG genre is incredibly appealing! The combination of turn-based battles and cosmetic items is a great way to keep players engaged. The pre-order skin pack also fits the game's world perfectly!

review_en: Ouch, that outage was rough! But Verizon's quick response with the $20 credit and easy app claim process is a good look. ~$32 USD in value â€“ not bad! Hoping for more stable service going forward.
title_en: Verizon Offers $20 Credit After Major Outage â€“ Here's How to Claim
summary_en:
â€¢ Verizon is offering a $20 account credit to customers affected by a major outage on January 15th.
â€¢ Customers must claim the credit through the My Verizon app, though it may take some time to appear.
â€¢ Verizon has apologized for the outage and pledged to improve service quality in the future.
content_en:
Verizon has announced a $20 account credit for customers impacted by a major outage that occurred on January 15th. To receive the credit, affected customers must claim it through the My Verizon app. However, the option may not be immediately available and could take some time to appear. Verizon states that affected customers will receive a text message notification when the credit is ready for redemption. The company clarifies that this credit is not intended to fully compensate for the disruption but serves as a gesture of goodwill. Verizon has issued a further apology for the outage and reaffirmed its commitment to providing outstanding network and service quality. The outage was fully resolved around 10 p.m. Eastern Time. Verizon recommends that customers still experiencing issues attempt a device restart. This outage represents a significant event impacting a large number of users.

Review (EN)

Ouch, that outage was rough! But Verizon's quick response with the $20 credit and easy app claim process is a good look. ~$32 USD in value â€“ not bad! Hoping for more stable service going forward.

title_en: iPhone 17e: Dynamic Island Confirmed, But Display Remains Unchanged?
summary_en:
â€¢ The iPhone 17e is Apple's upcoming budget model, slated for release in Spring 2026.
â€¢ The Dynamic Island is finally expected to be included, however, a display size increase or technological upgrade is not planned.
â€¢ The modem chip is expected to be upgraded to the C1.
content_en:
Apple's next budget offering, the iPhone 17e, is expected to be announced in the coming weeks, and rumors are gaining traction. According to the latest leak, while a significant display upgrade is not anticipated, design changes and component upgrades are planned. Notably, the iPhone 17e is expected to finally feature the Dynamic Island. However, the display is expected to remain a 6.1-inch LTPS OLED. Furthermore, the modem chip is reported to be upgraded to the latest C1. This information comes from Digital Chat Station, a well-known tipster on the Chinese social media platform Weibo. Overall, the iPhone 17e appears to be a model that will allow users to experience the latest features at a more affordable price point.

Review (EN)

Dynamic Island on a budget iPhone? Awesome! While the display is a bummer, the C1 modem upgrade is a huge win. This could be a seriously compelling device!

summary_en:
â€¢ Nine new titles have been added to the GeForce NOW library.
â€¢ Notably, the highly anticipated 'Star Wars Outlaws' will be available for cloud streaming.
â€¢ Titles like 'Quarantine Zone: The Last Check' and 'Guild Wars: Reforged' are also joining the service.
content_en:
NVIDIA has announced the addition of nine new game titles to its cloud gaming service, GeForce NOW, as of January 16, 2026. The lineup includes previously announced titles such as 'Quarantine Zone: The Last Check,' as well as highly anticipated new releases like 'Star Wars Outlaws' and 'The Legend of Heroes: Trails Beyond the Horizon.' GeForce NOW's smooth cloud streaming technology is expected to deliver a high-quality gaming experience for these titles. Release dates will vary by game, with staggered rollouts planned.

Wow! 'Star Wars Outlaws' on GeForce NOW is a game-changer! Cloud gaming is reaching new heights. This is huge!

review_en: A new character *every* month?! SNK is really listening to the fans. This is a must-follow for fighting game enthusiasts!
title_en: SNK Announces Monthly Character Releases for 'FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves' Season 2, Responding to Player Demand!
summary_en:
â€¢ Season 2 of 'FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves' is set to launch.
â€¢ SNK plans to release one character per month, responding to player requests.
â€¢ Season 2 will feature popular characters such as Wolfgang Krauser, Blue Mary, and Kim Jae Hoon.
content_en:
SNK's latest fighting game, 'FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves,' has been a significant success since its release, revitalizing the franchise after over two decades. Season 1 brought back fan favorites like Andy Bogard and Joe Higashi, alongside iconic characters from the 'Street Fighter' series such as Ken and Chun-Li. Season 2 will continue this trend with the addition of popular characters including Wolfgang Krauser, Blue Mary, and Kim Jae Hoon. SNK emphasizes responding quickly to player requests and aims for continuous game evolution by releasing one character per month. Anticipation is building for the full character lineup.

Review (EN)

A new character *every* month?! SNK is really listening to the fans. This is a must-follow for fighting game enthusiasts!

review_en: Wow, 25 years of RuneScape?! And Jagex is going *all in* with this investment! Huge news for long-time fans. Hyped for the Dragonwilds expansion!
title_en: RuneScape Celebrates 25 Years with Massive Investment! Jagex Announces Rebrand and Future Commitment!
summary_en:
â€¢ RuneScape is celebrating its 25th anniversary with Jagex announcing its largest ever investment.
â€¢ Jagex has rebranded to 'Jagex: The RuneScape Company', signaling a focus on the RuneScape franchise.
â€¢ New content, expansions for RuneScape: Dragonwilds, and a roadmap for Old School RuneScape have been revealed.
content_en:
RuneScape, one of the oldest online games still actively maintained, is celebrating its 25th anniversary. Jagex, the company that pioneered the MMORPG phenomenon, has announced its 'largest ever investment' into the future of the franchise. This includes rebranding the company to Jagex: The RuneScape Company, as well as significant investment in developing new content, expanding RuneScape: Dragonwilds, and a new roadmap for Old School RuneScape. A new video from the studio showcases the team's plans, generating considerable excitement for the future. This investment is a significant boon for the RuneScape community and promises further development of the game.

Review (EN)

Wow, 25 years of RuneScape?! And Jagex is going *all in* with this investment! Huge news for long-time fans. Hyped for the Dragonwilds expansion!

title_en: Guild Wars 3 Development Reignited? ArenaNet Job Ad Sparks Rumors!
summary_en:
â€¢ NCSOFT Chairman Park Byeong hinted at the start of Guild Wars 3 development in March 2024.
â€¢ ArenaNet neither confirmed nor denied the claim, stating their focus was on Guild Wars 2 updates.
â€¢ Reddit users discovered a Senior Writer/Narrative Designer job ad at ArenaNet, reigniting development rumors.
content_en:
In March 2024, NCSOFT Acting Chairman Park Byeong hinted during an investor meeting that ArenaNet had begun development on Guild Wars 3. ArenaNet responded by stating they were focused on new Guild Wars 2 updates and expansions, a response that was neither a confirmation nor a denial. Approximately two years later, Reddit users discovered a job advertisement for a 'Contract Senior Writer/Narrative Designer' at ArenaNet, reigniting discussions surrounding the project. The ad also mentions Unreal Engine, suggesting the potential use of a next-generation game engine. Further information is eagerly anticipated.

Review (EN)

Seriously hyped! Guild Wars 2 is amazing, so news of GW3 development is fantastic. Unreal Engine 5 could mean incredible graphics and a deeper story!

title_en: Raspberry Pi AI HAT+ 2 Unveiled: Bringing Generative AI to the Edge!
summary_en:
â€¢ The Raspberry Pi AI HAT+ 2, an AI expansion board for the Raspberry Pi 5, has been announced.
â€¢ In addition to the Hailo-8/8L accelerators, it now supports generative AI models.
â€¢ Enables edge AI with data privacy and security, eliminating the need for cloud services.
content_en:
The Raspberry Pi Foundation has announced the Raspberry Pi AI HAT+ 2, an AI expansion board for the Raspberry Pi 5. The previous model, the AI HAT+ featured the Hailo-8/8L accelerators for excellent vision processing and enabled edge AI, but lacked support for generative AI models. The AI HAT+ 2 overcomes this limitation, enabling the execution of generative AI models directly on the device. This reduces reliance on cloud services and enhances data privacy and security. Please refer to the official website for further details.

Review (EN)

Seriously impressive specs! Generative AI running on the edge with a Raspberry Pi feels like a dream come true. The privacy benefits of running AI on your own data, without cloud costs, are huge. Must-have!

review_en: Wi-Fi 7 + AirGuard? Seriously impressive! This is a game-changer for security in critical environments. Dedicated scanning radios without performance hits? EnGenius is raising the bar!
title_en: EnGenius Unveils Wi-Fi 7 Cloud-Managed AP with 24/7 AirGuard Security!
summary_en:
â€¢ EnGenius has integrated AirGuard into its ECW536S Wi-Fi 7 AP series, targeting security-sensitive environments like financial institutions and healthcare facilities.
â€¢ AirGuard is a WIDS/WIPS that detects and neutralizes various wireless threats 24/7, including rogue APs, man-in-the-middle attacks, and RF jamming.
â€¢ Utilizing dedicated scanning radios, it provides constant security protection without compromising wireless performance.
content_en:
EnGenius Technologies Inc., a global leader in advanced connectivity and cloud-managed networking solutions, today announced the expansion of its EnGenius Cloud-managed security portfolio. This expansion introduces advanced Wi-Fi 7 access points featuring EnGenius AirGuard, designed for security-sensitive environments such as financial institutions, healthcare facilities, and enterprises. AirGuard is an intelligent wireless intrusion detection and prevention system (WIDS/WIPS) built into the APs, leveraging dedicated scanning radios to detect and neutralize threats like evil twins, rogue APs, man-in-the-middle attacks, RF jammers, and flood attempts 24/7. This always-on security protection operates without compromising wireless performance. Professional-grade RF spectrum analysis visualizes SSID legitimacy and ensures optimal channel utilization, while zero-wait DFS facilitates seamless, non-disruptive channel shifts when radar is detected. Additionally, BLE scanning capabilities detect nearby Bluetooth devices. This announcement represents a significant contribution to enhancing enterprise network security.

Review (EN)

Wi-Fi 7 + AirGuard? Seriously impressive! This is a game-changer for security in critical environments. Dedicated scanning radios without performance hits? EnGenius is raising the bar!

title_en: TSMC Plans Record Capital Expenditure to Meet Surging AI Demand!
summary_en:
â€¢ TSMC is reportedly 'overwhelmed' by demand from the AI sector and plans to significantly increase its capital expenditure.
â€¢ Strong demand from HPC customers like NVIDIA drove TSMC's strong Q4 2025 earnings.
â€¢ AI demand is expected to continue, and TSMC is positioning itself for further growth.
content_en:
TSMC has announced that demand from the AI sector is exceeding expectations. Notably, demand from HPC (High-Performance Computing) customers such as NVIDIA is driving significant growth in TSMC's Q4 2025 earnings. In response, TSMC has announced plans to undertake a record-level capital expenditure (CapEx). According to comments from C.C. Wei, AI demand is expected to intensify further, and TSMC is accelerating efforts to expand its manufacturing capacity to meet this demand. This move underscores the significant impact of AI technology advancements and adoption on the semiconductor industry. Considering the exchange rate (as of January 16, 2026: 1 USD = 158 JPY), this capital expenditure could have a positive indirect impact on the Japanese economy.

Review (EN)

TSMC's massive CapEx plan is HUGE! The AI boom is real, and TSMC is stepping up to meet the challenge. Incredible!

title_en: MediaTek Dimensity 9500s: Performance-Focused with 3nm Process! Details of the Next-Gen Flagship SoC Revealed!
summary_en:
â€¢ MediaTek has announced the 3nm Dimensity 9500s to compete with the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 5.
â€¢ By eliminating efficiency cores and configuring all cores as high-performance cores, multi-core performance is improved.
â€¢ It supports a class-leading 19MB CPU cache and 9600MT/s LPDDR5X memory.
content_en:
MediaTek has announced the Dimensity 9500s, leveraging TSMCâ€™s 3nm N3E process, as a competitor to the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 5. While sharing many similarities with its more powerful sibling, the Dimensity 9500, this new SoC adopts a bold design by forgoing efficiency cores entirely, opting for an â€˜all-performanceâ€™ CPU cluster to enhance multi-core performance. Furthermore, it boasts a class-leading 19MB CPU cache and supports 9600MT/s LPDDR5X memory, significantly improving data processing speeds. The chipset utilizes the ARM Immortalis-G925 GPU, promising superior graphics fidelity and ray tracing support. This SoC is expected to power next-generation smartphones, and its performance is highly anticipated.

Review (EN)

Seriously impressive specs! Ditching efficiency cores for pure performance? That's a bold move from MediaTek. 19MB cache is a game-changer for demanding apps. Bring on the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 competition!

title_en: BREAKING: NVIDIA Significantly Cuts RTX 50 Series Supply! No New GPUs This Year Possible?!
summary_en:
â€¢ NVIDIA reportedly reduced GPU supply to AIC partners by 15-20%.
â€¢ The entire RTX 50 series is experiencing reduced supply, potentially impacting prices and availability.
â€¢ In addition to the cancellation of some models like the RTX 5070 Ti, there's a possibility the 'Super' series won't launch this year.
content_en:
Reports from prominent hardware leaker @Zed__Wang indicate that NVIDIA has reduced GPU supply to its AIC partners by approximately 15-20%. This reduction appears to affect the entire RTX 50 series product lineup, not just specific models. This will likely impact pricing and availability. Furthermore, alongside the reported discontinuation of models like the RTX 5070 Ti, there's a growing possibility that NVIDIA will not release a 'Super' series this year. This represents a significant potential shift in NVIDIA's strategy and warrants close monitoring of market developments.

Review (EN)

Whoa, this is huge! Reduced RTX 50 series supply is a blow to gamers. The RTX 5070 Ti cancellation is a shame, but maybe NVIDIA has a surprise up its sleeve! I'm hyped!

title_en: OpenAI's 'Sweetpea' Earbuds to Feature Samsung's 2nm Exynos Chip? Titan ASIC Launch Possible by Year-End!
summary_en:
â€¢ OpenAI appears to be aiming to build an ecosystem that integrates AI models with hardware.
â€¢ The next-generation AI earbuds, 'Sweetpea,' may adopt Samsung's 2nm Exynos chip.
â€¢ OpenAI's proprietary AI ASIC, 'Titan,' could be announced by the end of the year.
content_en:
OpenAI is seemingly intent on building a sprawling hardware ecosystem to complement its AI-based subscription services, aiming to lock in customers across its various GPT-class AI models, dedicated AI ASICs, and a range of consumer devices, including the iPod Shuffle-like 'Gumdrop' and AI earbuds 'Sweetpea.' According to recent reports from Taiwan, OpenAI is reportedly developing dedicated AI-powered earbuds codenamed 'Sweetpea.' While details are currently limited, the report suggests the earbuds may utilize Samsung's 2nm Exynos chip, likely to enhance AI functionality. Furthermore, OpenAI is potentially planning to announce its proprietary AI ASIC, 'Titan,' by the end of the year. This could significantly boost OpenAI's AI processing capabilities and enable the delivery of more advanced AI services. This development represents a crucial step in accelerating the evolution of AI technology and its integration with hardware.

Review (EN)

A 2nm chip in AI earbuds?! That's insane! Expect a huge leap in AI processing power â€“ real-time translation & advanced noise cancellation are within reach. OpenAI's hardware push will be a game-changer.

title_en: Axiomtek Launches IMB711 ATX Server Motherboard Supporting Latest Xeon Processors â€“ Accelerating AI in Healthcare!
summary_en:
â€¢ Axiomtek has released the IMB711, an ATX server-grade motherboard supporting 5th/4th Gen Intel Xeon Scalable processors.
â€¢ Equipped with the Intel C741 chipset, it's ideal for mission-critical applications including AI acceleration, data centers, and advanced healthcare systems.
â€¢ Significantly accelerates AI workloads in healthcare, such as CT/MRI image reconstruction and advanced X-ray imaging for radiation therapy.
content_en:
Axiomtek has announced the launch of its IMB711, an ATX server-grade motherboard designed to support 5th/4th Gen Intel Xeon Scalable processors. Featuring the Intel C741 chipset, the IMB711 supports processors with up to 270W TDP, delivering exceptional core density and sustained computing performance. This motherboard is an ideal platform for mission-critical applications, including AI acceleration, data centers, and advanced healthcare systems. It is particularly well-suited to accelerate AI workloads in the medical field, such as high-end CT and MRI image reconstruction, and advanced X-ray imaging for radiation therapy. The IMB711 is designed for 24/7 continuous operation, ensuring high reliability.

Review (EN)

Seriously impressive specs! Supporting the latest Xeon Scalable processors with optimizations for medical AI is a game-changer. This motherboard could very well power the future of AI in healthcare.

content_en:
MediaTek today announced two new SoCs: the Dimensity 9500s and the Dimensity 8500. These chipsets represent the latest additions to the Dimensity family and are engineered to enhance performance, efficiency, AI capabilities, imaging, gaming, and wireless connectivity in smartphones. JC Hsu, Corporate Senior Vice President at MediaTek, stated, â€œAs leaders in smartphone global share, we are committed to increasing our investment in advanced technologies and striving to make bleeding-edge products available to more people. title_en: SK hynix Denies Consumer Business Exit, But DRAM Supply Situation Worsens!
summary_en:
â€¢ SK hynix has denied rumors of exiting the consumer business.
â€¢ However, satisfying consumer demand may become difficult due to balancing it with AI demand.
â€¢ Micron's exit from the Crucial business raises concerns about potential impacts on SK hynix.
content_en:
SK hynix has officially responded to rumors regarding a potential exit from the consumer business, stating that there are currently no such plans. However, with ongoing memory shortages, suppliers like SK hynix and Micron are being forced to make aggressive decisions to meet market demand. The surge in AI demand is particularly impacting the balance between consumer and AI supply. While SK hynix intends to continue satisfying consumer demand through OEM channels, prioritizing AI supply is becoming increasingly necessary. Concerns are rising that SK hynix may face similar impacts following Micron's exit from the Crucial business. The DRAM supply situation requires continued monitoring.

Review (EN)

AI demand is exploding! While reduced consumer supply is a shame, it's understandable given the DRAM supply situation. Watching SK hynix's next moves closely!

We commend the development team's efforts and look forward to further advancements.

This ARM64 support is incredible! The possibility of playing PS3 games on previously unsupported devices... Huge thanks to the RPCS3 team! This is a massive win for gadget enthusiasts!

title_en: Setapp Mobile Exits EU Market! Is Apple's Complex Fee Structure to Blame?
summary_en:
â€¢ MacPaw announced it will close its iOS alternative app store for the EU, 'Setapp Mobile,' on February 16, 2026.
â€¢ The reason for the closure is that Apple's 'still-evolving and complex business terms' do not fit Setapp's business model.
â€¢ The Epic Games Store is also struggling with Apple's fees, suggesting that operating alternative app stores is challenging.
content_en:
Ukrainian developer MacPaw announced it will close Setapp Mobile, its alternative iOS app store for the European Union, on February 16, 2026. The company cites Apple's 'still-evolving and complex business terms' as the reason, stating they do not align with Setapp's current business model. Setapp Mobile launched in open beta in September 2024 but will cease operations after just a year and a half. This closure highlights the struggles faced by alternative app stores that emerged following the Digital Markets Act (DMA) in the EU, which mandates support for third-party app marketplaces on iOS. While the Epic Games Store currently pays Apple's Core Technology Fee, CEO Tim Sweeney has stated it is 'not financially viable' in the long term. Sweeney has repeatedly criticized the fee, describing it as 'ruinous for any hopes of a competing store getting a foothold,' and Setapp Mobile may well be its first major casualty. Setapp's separate Mac app store will continue to operate normally.

Review (EN)

Honestly, while somewhat expected, Apple's fees are brutal. The DMA was supposed to encourage competition, but it seems Apple's influence remains strong. Setapp Mobile's attempt will significantly impact the future of alternative app stores. Watching closely!

review_en: Seriously impressive how the Fallout 3 team overcame criticism to create such an amazing game! Learning about the development process just deepens my appreciation. Definitely want to read that EDGE Magazine interview!
title_en: Fallout 3 Development Secrets: Bethesda's Resolve to Turn Criticism into Strength
summary_en:
â€¢ Bethesda faced significant criticism from fans when they acquired the Fallout license.
â€¢ According to Angela Browder, the criticism allowed the development team to freely pursue their vision.
â€¢ The struggles and successes of Fallout 3's development are discussed in an interview with EDGE Magazine.
content_en:
Angela Browder, Studio and Production Director at Bethesda Game Studios, discussed the criticism the studio received from fans when they acquired the Fallout license in an article published in EDGE Magazine (February 2026, #419). At the time, Bethesda was known for the Elder Scrolls series, and some fans strongly opposed a studio famous for fantasy games touching the Fallout franchise. However, Ms. Browder stated that the criticism actually allowed the team to approach development freely, unburdened by preconceptions. In a sense, the criticism liberated the team and served as a driving force to create a unique Fallout experience. This interview provides valuable insight into the behind-the-scenes story of how Fallout 3 came to be.

Review (EN)

Seriously impressive how the Fallout 3 team overcame criticism to create such an amazing game! Learning about the development process just deepens my appreciation. Definitely want to read that EDGE Magazine interview!

title_en: AMD Explores 3D Stacking for L2 Cache â€“ Potential for Dramatic CPU Performance Gains!
summary_en:
â€¢ AMD has begun researching 3D stacking technology for L2 cache, following its success with L3 cache.
â€¢ A new research paper, 'Balanced Latency Stacked Cache,' details techniques for stacked L2 cache with low latency.
â€¢ This technology has the potential to enable future AMD CPUs to achieve higher performance and efficiency.
content_en:
Building on the success of its 3D V-Cache technology for L3 cache, AMD is now exploring the possibility of applying 3D stacking to L2 cache. The recently published research paper, 'Balanced Latency Stacked Cache' (Patent Application No. US20260003794A1), details a novel cache system that vertically stacks multiple cache dies, enabling access with lower latency than traditional designs. This technology has the potential to significantly improve CPU performance and enhance power efficiency. AMD is considering integrating this technology into future CPU products, and its realization is highly anticipated. The effects are expected to be particularly noticeable in gaming and demanding applications.

Review (EN)

Absolutely mind-blowing specs! Stacking L2 cache? AMD's engineering prowess is incredible. Can't wait to see what the next-gen Ryzen CPUs will bring!

review_en: Whoa, this is huge! The RTX 5070 Ti is already discontinued?! Didn't expect the DRAM shortage to have *this* much impact. Prioritizing the RTX 5060 Ti 8GB makes sense, but it's a blow for those wanting the 16GB version. NVIDIA's strategy is interesting... the GPU market is about to get wild!
title_en: ã€BREAKINGã€‘RTX 5070 Ti Production Halted?! RTX 5060 Ti 16GB Also Facing Discontinuation...
summary_en:
â€¢ NVIDIA has reportedly ended production of the GeForce RTX 5070 Ti.
â€¢ According to information from ASUS, the RTX 5060 Ti 16GB version is also subject to production adjustments.
â€¢ DRAM shortages are impacting production, with the RTX 5060 Ti 8GB version taking priority.
content_en:
NVIDIA has reportedly ceased production of its mid-range GeForce RTX 5070 Ti graphics card, according to exclusive information shared with Hardware Unboxed by ASUS, a major PC manufacturer. As one of NVIDIA's largest AIB partners, ASUS understands the model is effectively at the end of its life cycle. Current stock levels of the RTX 5070 Ti are limited at retailers and manufacturers, leading to significant price increases and potential future unavailability. Furthermore, the RTX 5060 Ti 16GB version is also entering a phase of production curtailment, with resources being redirected to the lower-capacity RTX 5060 Ti 8GB version. Inventory of the 16GB SKU is dwindling across retailers and distributors, reflected in rising prices. The ongoing DRAM shortage is impacting GDDR7 memory for graphics cards, and the 8GB version will remain available until supply chain and memory production improve. Recent rumors also confirm NVIDIA's prioritization of the standard RTX 5060 for this segment.

Review (EN)

Whoa, this is huge! The RTX 5070 Ti is already discontinued?! Didn't expect the DRAM shortage to have *this* much impact. Prioritizing the RTX 5060 Ti 8GB makes sense, but it's a blow for those wanting the 16GB version. NVIDIA's strategy is interesting... the GPU market is about to get wild!

review_en: Absolutely incredible forecast! AI is supercharging the semiconductor market beyond expectations. The demand from data centers is particularly impressive. Excited to see what innovations come next!
title_en: AI Drives Semiconductor Market Beyond $1 Trillion! Historic Milestone Expected in 2026!
summary_en:
â€¢ Global semiconductor revenues are projected to exceed $1 trillion in 2026.
â€¢ The surge in demand from the AI market is driving revenue growth in memory and logic ICs.
â€¢ Strong demand from data centers and AI-capable notebooks is fueling particularly high growth.
content_en:
According to Omdia's latest market analysis, global semiconductor revenues are forecast to exceed $1 trillion in 2026, marking a historic milestone for the industry. This growth is being driven by the rapid surge in memory and logic IC revenues, generated by massive demand from the AI market. The semiconductor revenue forecast for 2025 has been significantly increased to 20.3% year-over-year (YoY), reflecting stronger-than-anticipated 3Q25 results and robust growth expected in 4Q25. Revenue growth in DRAM and NAND memory ICs will remain unprecedented, supported by strong expansion in Logic ICs, bringing the 2026 market forecast to 30.7% YoY. Computing & Data Storage is expected to lead all segments in semiconductor revenue growth, rising 41.4% YoY in 2026 to exceed $500 billion, due to high demand in data center servers and other memory-intensive applications, as well as higher memory IC pricing. Notebook PC growth is being fueled by AI-capable adoption and a large-scale enterprise refresh cycle. Collectively, the top four hyperscalers are expected to spend approximately $500 billion on capital expenditures this year, with further growth expected. Capital spending is being reallocated toward AI infrastructure, model development, and emerging applications, highlighting the transformative impact of AI across sectors.

Review (EN)

Absolutely incredible forecast! AI is supercharging the semiconductor market beyond expectations. The demand from data centers is particularly impressive. Excited to see what innovations come next!

review_en: Seriously impressive EMIB tech! Lower costs & more design freedom than 2.5D? Intel's packaging game is leveling up. Hyped for Clearwater Forest! This could be a game-changer for chiplet designs.
title_en: Intel's EMIB Interconnect Outperforms Traditional 2.5D Chips: Cost Savings & Design Flexibility!
summary_en:
â€¢ Intel's EMIB technology demonstrates superior cost-effectiveness compared to traditional 2.5D chip technologies.
â€¢ EMIB offers ease of design and increased flexibility for advanced packaging solutions.
â€¢ EMIB has been implemented in Intel's latest chips, including Ponte Vecchio and Sapphire Rapids, and is slated for future deployment in Clearwater Forest.
content_en:
Intel has announced that its EMIB (Embedded Multi-die Interconnect Bridge) interconnect solution outperforms traditional 2.5D chip technologies. EMIB achieves cost reduction, ease of design, and increased flexibility in advanced packaging solutions. Intel has utilized EMIB technology in various chips, including Ponte Vecchio, Sapphire Rapids, Granite Rapids, and Sierra Forest, and plans to deploy it in the upcoming Clearwater Forest. This technology is expected to contribute to the scaling of next-generation chips, both for chips manufactured by Intel itself and for its foundry business. EMIB provides a more efficient interconnect in chiplet-based designs, offering advantages in both performance and cost. Intel's commitment to advanced packaging technology will likely have a significant impact on the entire industry.

Review (EN)

Seriously impressive EMIB tech! Lower costs & more design freedom than 2.5D? Intel's packaging game is leveling up. Hyped for Clearwater Forest! This could be a game-changer for chiplet designs.

title_en: NVIDIA RTX 50 Series Production Realigned Amidst Severe Memory Shortages! RTX 5070 Ti Production Halted?
summary_en:
â€¢ NVIDIA appears to be realigning its entire RTX 50 series production to counter memory shortages.
â€¢ ASUS has announced that RTX 5070 Ti production has halted, indicating a focus on limiting inventories to fewer RTX 50 series GPUs.
â€¢ Gaming GPUs may be receiving lower priority, potentially impacting future supply.
content_en:
Reports indicate that NVIDIA is realigning production of its entire RTX 50 series GPU stack to address ongoing memory shortages. ASUS has announced the halt of RTX 5070 Ti production, suggesting NVIDIA is focusing inventories on a smaller selection of RTX 50 series GPUs. This situation implies that gaming GPUs are becoming a lower priority for GPU manufacturers, potentially impacting future supply. Prolonged memory shortages could also affect the release date and pricing of the RTX 50 series. Further updates will be provided as information becomes available.

Review (EN)

Whoa, this is serious! Memory shortages before the RTX 50 series even launches... This could drive up prices for high-end GPUs. If ASUS halts production, others might follow. Definitely keeping a close eye on this!

review_en: Honestly, I was shocked by the initial specs! 32GB of RAM felt unrealistic for anyone without a high-end PC. This revision clearly shows IO Interactive listened to player feedback. Huge thanks to them! This really boosts my excitement!
title_en: 007 First Light System Requirements Significantly Lowered! No Need to Worry About RAM Anymore?!
summary_en:
â€¢ The PC recommended specifications for the popular FPS "007 First Light" have been significantly reduced, particularly regarding RAM capacity.
â€¢ The initial recommended specifications required 32GB of RAM, but the revised specifications have been changed to more realistic values.
â€¢ This change means many gamers will no longer need to upgrade their RAM.
content_en:
IO Interactive has updated the PC system requirements for its upcoming FPS title, "007 First Light." The previously announced specifications recommended 32GB of RAM for 1080p resolution gameplay at 60fps, which drew criticism from many gamers as being excessively high. However, today, IO Interactive revised the system requirements, significantly reducing the required RAM capacity. While the specific numbers haven't been released yet, it's expected that more PC configurations will be able to run the game comfortably. This revision is welcome news, especially given the current high cost of memory, as it will reduce the number of gamers needing to upgrade their RAM. Further detailed specifications are eagerly anticipated.

Review (EN)

Honestly, I was shocked by the initial specs! 32GB of RAM felt unrealistic for anyone without a high-end PC. This revision clearly shows IO Interactive listened to player feedback. Huge thanks to them! This really boosts my excitement!

â€¢ æŠ•è³‡å®¶åˆ†æã«ã‚ˆã‚‹ã¨ã€ä½å®¹é‡ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ãŒæœ€ã‚‚å£²ã‚Œã‚‹ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³ã«ãªã‚‹å¯èƒ½æ€§ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚
review_en: DRAM & NAND price hikes sting, but a stable base model price is a win! Higher capacity buyers might need to save a bit more. Still hyped for the iPhone 18 though!
title_en: iPhone 18 Higher Capacity Models Facing Price Hike Due to Soaring DRAM & NAND Costs!
summary_en:
â€¢ Higher capacity iPhone 18 models are potentially facing a price increase due to rising DRAM and NAND flash memory costs.
â€¢ The base model price is expected to remain unchanged, but users desiring increased storage may need to adjust their budgets.
â€¢ Investor analysis suggests lower capacity models will likely be the best-selling versions.
content_en:
Recent information suggests that Apple, having already increased prices for the iPhone 17 models, may implement further price adjustments with the upcoming iPhone 18 launch. A primary driver of this potential change is the soaring cost of DRAM and NAND flash memory. Fortunately, investor analysis indicates that any price increases will be limited to higher capacity models, with the base model price likely to remain stable. This situation is expected to boost the popularity of lower capacity models, potentially making them the best-selling versions. Despite Apple's supply chain advantages, the impact of memory market fluctuations on pricing is a key trend to watch in the smartphone market.

Review (EN)

DRAM & NAND price hikes sting, but a stable base model price is a win! Higher capacity buyers might need to save a bit more. Still hyped for the iPhone 18 though!

review_en: Seriously impressive specs! A 2TB CXL 2.0 module hitting the market is a game-changer for AI and database performance. Huge step forward!
title_en: Penguin Solutions Announces CXL 2.0 Compliant 2TB NV-CMM Module! Pioneering Next-Gen Memory Tech!
summary_en:
â€¢ Penguin Solutions' SMART Modular CXL NV-CMM E3.S 2T module has been listed on the CXL Consortium's Integrators List.
â€¢ It utilizes the CXL 2.0 standard, offering low latency and high bandwidth persistent storage.
â€¢ Enables efficient checkpointing and caching for in-memory databases, and rapid data recovery after power loss.
content_en:
Penguin Solutions, Inc., a leading provider of high-performance computing and AI infrastructure solutions, today announced that its SMART Modular CXL NV-CMM E3.S 2T non-volatile memory module has successfully passed CXL compliance testing. This achievement not only signifies adherence to industry standards but also positions Penguin Solutions as a trusted leader in advanced memory technology for CXL applications. The module utilizes the Compute Express Link (CXL) 2.0 standard, offering low latency, high bandwidth persistent storage with enterprise-class RAS features. This accelerates system performance through efficient checkpointing and caching for in-memory databases and ensures quick data recovery following power loss or system crashes. The CXL NV-CMM E3.S 2T module is now listed on the CXL Consortium's Integrators List.

Review (EN)

Seriously impressive specs! A 2TB CXL 2.0 module hitting the market is a game-changer for AI and database performance. Huge step forward!

review_en: Dynamic Island is great news, but sticking with 60Hz is a bit of a letdown. Really curious about the A19 chip's performance. If the downclocked version matches the A17 Pro, it'll still be very appealing!
title_en: iPhone 17e: Dynamic Island Confirmed, But Still Stuck with 60Hz Display?
summary_en:
â€¢ Leaks indicate the iPhone 17e will feature a Dynamic Island instead of a notch.
â€¢ However, it will retain a 60Hz refresh rate, foregoing the 120Hz ProMotion technology.
â€¢ The device is expected to include an A19 chip, though a downclocked version is also a possibility.
content_en:
Apple's upcoming iPhone 17e is set to feature a Dynamic Island in place of the notch at the top of the screen, according to a well-known Weibo leaker. However, unlike the rest of the iPhone 17 lineup, the display refresh rate will remain at 60Hz. Apple introduced ProMotion display technology with up to a 120Hz refresh rate last year, but this feature will not be included in the iPhone 17e to reduce costs. According to the leaker "Digital Chat Station," the iPhone 17e will feature a 6.1-inch OLED display with a 60Hz refresh rate. The Dynamic Island will add the interactive area at the top of the screen, incorporating the camera and other front-facing sensors. Given that the iPhone 16e features a notch similar to the iPhone 13 and 14, it's likely the iPhone 17e is based on the 2023 iPhone 15 design. The leaker also reiterated a previous claim that the iPhone 17e will be equipped with an A19 chip instead of the A18 found in the current iPhone 16e. The A19 chip is based on TSMC's third-generation 3nm process, N3P, and is expected to offer 5-10% improved CPU performance. Another Weibo leaker suggests Apple may use a downclocked A19 chip in the iPhone 17e, which would result in performance roughly comparable to Apple's A17 Pro chip. Furthermore, rumors suggest the iPhone 17e will gain a magnetic ring for MagSafe charger compatibility, a feature absent in the iPhone 16e. To cut costs, the device may be equipped with either the older C1 or C1X modem, but without the N1 wireless chip. The device is expected to retain a front-facing 12-megapixel camera, Face ID, and a rear 48-megapixel camera. The iPhone 17e could launch as early as February, as the iPhone 16e did last year, but a spring release is also possible. The starting price is not expected to change at $599.

Review (EN)

Dynamic Island is great news, but sticking with 60Hz is a bit of a letdown. Really curious about the A19 chip's performance. If the downclocked version matches the A17 Pro, it'll still be very appealing!

title_en: Finally! Apple Pay in China Now Supports International Travel! ğŸ’³âœ¨
summary_en:
â€¢ Eight major Chinese banks now support Visa card usage abroad.
â€¢ Apple Pay will be seamlessly and securely usable outside of China.
â€¢ Mastercard is also planning to launch support soon.
content_en:
Apple today announced the expansion of cross-border Apple Pay support in mainland China. This allows users with Visa credit and debit cards issued by local banks to make contactless payments in-store and online while traveling abroad. Currently, eight major Chinese banks support this feature, including the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China, Bank of China, Agricultural Bank of China, and China Merchants Bank, with Shanghai Pudong Development Bank and China Construction Bank planning to add support in the coming months. Mastercard is also preparing similar support for select cardholders. Jennifer Bailey, Apple's Vice President of Apple Pay and Apple Wallet, stated, â€œWith this expansion of cross-border Apple Pay capabilities in mainland China, weâ€™re making travel more seamless and secure, giving users confidence in their payments wherever they go.â€ Apple Pay launched in 2014 and has since expanded to dozens of countries and territories worldwide.

Review (EN)

Huge news! This makes traveling abroad with Apple Pay from China so much easier. A game changer for cashless Japan!

title_en: Crucial P310 SSD Dominates Amazon Best-Seller Charts! 4TB Model Available at a Stunning Price!
summary_en:
â€¢ The Crucial P310 SSD 4TB model has become Amazon's best-selling solid-state drive.
â€¢ It supports PCIe NVMe Gen 4, achieving a maximum transfer speed of up to 7,100MB/s.
â€¢ With concerns about a potential NAND SSD shortage, now is an excellent time to upgrade.
content_en:
News has surfaced that the Crucial P310 SSD 4TB model has become Amazon's best-selling solid-state drive. Priced at $344.99 (approximately Â¥54,388 JPY), it supports PCIe NVMe Gen 4, delivering a maximum transfer speed of up to 7,100MB/s. Concerns are growing regarding a potential NAND SSD shortage, particularly as NVIDIA's next-generation AI systems are expected to utilize significant quantities of NAND SSDs, potentially exacerbating supply constraints. Therefore, now is considered an optimal time to upgrade SSDs and RAM. It supports a wide range of devices, including PCs, laptops, and consoles, and will contribute to performance improvements.

Review (EN)

Seriously impressive specs! 4TB at this price, and 7,100MB/s?! Definitely a must-buy before the supply crunch hits. Highly recommend for anyone doing AI development or video editing!

title_en: Monster Hunter Wilds PC Performance Could Double by Removing DLC Checks!
summary_en:
â€¢ PC performance issues with Monster Hunter Wilds persist nearly a year after release.
â€¢ Improvements have been attempted using modder Praydog's REFramework and a texture decompressor tool.
â€¢ Removing DLC checks may significantly boost performance.
content_en:
The PC version of Monster Hunter Wilds has faced performance issues since its launch. Renowned modder Praydog published an updated version of his REFramework shortly after release to address stuttering caused by the game's anti-tampering technology. A texture decompressor tool was also released in April 2025 to minimize stuttering related to real-time in-game texture decompression. While the developer has worked to improve performance, including adding support for NVIDIA DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation and AMD FSR 4, fundamental problems remain. Recent reports suggest that removing DLC checks could potentially double performance, making this a significant development for PC players.

Review (EN)

This is huge! Wilds PC performance has been a pain point for many, so a potential 2x boost just by removing DLC checks is a game-changer. Huge respect to Praydog!

title_en: BREAKING: NVIDIA and Eli Lilly Partner to Establish Joint AI Lab, Investing Up to $1 Billion to Revolutionize Drug Discovery!
summary_en:
â€¢ NVIDIA and Eli Lilly are co-founding an AI lab to pursue next-generation drug discovery leveraging artificial intelligence.
â€¢ The companies will invest up to $1 billion over five years to bolster AI infrastructure and research & development.
â€¢ Utilizing NVIDIAâ€™s BioNeMo platform and Vera Rubin architecture, the lab will employ robotics and physical AI to accelerate the drug discovery process.
content_en:
NVIDIA and Eli Lilly today announced a first-of-its-kind AI co-innovation lab focused on applying AI to tackle some of the most enduring challenges in the pharmaceutical industry. The lab brings together Lillyâ€™s world-leading expertise in discovering, developing and manufacturing medicines with NVIDIAâ€™s leadership in AI, accelerated computing and AI infrastructure. The two companies will invest up to $1 billion in talent, infrastructure and compute over five years to support the new AI co-innovation lab. Based in the San Francisco Bay Area, the lab will co-locate Lilly domain experts in biology, science and medicine with top AI model builders and engineers from NVIDIA, allowing them to work side by side to generate large-scale data and build powerful AI models that can accelerate medicine development, using NVIDIA BioNeMo as the critical platform. The collaboration will initially focus on creating a continuous learning system that tightly connects Lillyâ€™s agentic wet labs with computational dry labs, enabling 24/7 AI-assisted experimentation to support biologists and chemists. This scientist-in-the-loop framework aims to enable experiments, data generation and AI model development to continuously inform and improve one another.

Review (EN)

Whoa! NVIDIA & Lilly teaming up for AI drug discovery? That's HUGE! $1B investment is insane. This could be a total game-changer for pharma! ğŸ”¥

review_en: Absolutely incredible numbers! 28% 3nm revenue share proves TSMC's dominance. The future of chip tech is looking bright!
title_en: TSMC Announces Stellar Q4 2025 Results! Explosive Growth & 3nm Process Tech Takes Center Stage!
summary_en:
â€¢ TSMC's Q4 2025 revenue reached NT$1,046.09 billion, a 20.5% year-over-year increase.
â€¢ Net income rose 35.0% year-over-year to NT$505.74 billion, with EPS at NT$19.50 (US$3.14 per ADR).
â€¢ 3nm process technology accounted for 28% of total wafer revenue, with advanced technologies (7nm and below) representing 77%.
content_en:
TSMC today announced consolidated revenue of NT$1,046.09 billion, net income of NT$505.74 billion, and diluted earnings per share of NT$19.50 (US$3.14 per ADR unit) for the fourth quarter ended December 31, 2025. Year-over-year, fourth quarter revenue increased 20.5% while net income and diluted EPS both increased 35.0%. Compared to third quarter 2025, fourth quarter results represented a 5.7% increase in revenue and an 11.8% increase in net income. All figures were prepared in accordance with TIFRS on a consolidated basis. In US dollars, fourth quarter revenue was $33.73 billion, which increased 25.5% year-over-year and increased 1.9% from the previous quarter. Gross margin for the quarter was 62.3%, operating margin was 54.0%, and net profit margin was 48.3%. In the fourth quarter, shipments of 3-nanometer accounted for 28% of total wafer revenue; 5-nanometer accounted for 35%; 7-nanometer accounted for 14%. Advanced technologies, defined as 7-nanometer and more advanced technologies, accounted for 77% of total wafer revenue. This is a key indicator demonstrating TSMC's technological prowess and market leadership.

Review (EN)

Absolutely incredible numbers! 28% 3nm revenue share proves TSMC's dominance. The future of chip tech is looking bright!

title_en: Rockstar Launches Cfx Marketplace: Official Mod Store for FiveM and RedM, Fueling Creator Economy!
summary_en:
â€¢ Rockstar Games has launched the 'Cfx Marketplace,' an official store for FiveM and RedM mod creators.
â€¢ This allows mod creators to sell their work, establishing a new revenue stream.
â€¢ This move suggests a strong focus on user-generated content in future titles, potentially including Grand Theft Auto VI.
content_en:
Rockstar Games has launched the 'Cfx Marketplace,' a digital storefront dedicated to mods for the FiveM and RedM frameworks used with Grand Theft Auto V and Red Dead Redemption 2. This platform enables creators to monetize their modifications, providing a new avenue for revenue generation. Several creators have already signed up for the marketplace, signaling a vibrant modding community. This announcement underscores Rockstar Games' commitment to user-generated content and hints at potentially expanded mod support in future titles, particularly Grand Theft Auto VI. This development is expected to significantly contribute to the growth of the creator economy within the gaming industry.

Review (EN)

Huge news! Rockstar officially supporting modding with a marketplace is a game-changer. This will unlock incredible creativity and extend the life of their games. Can't wait to see what's next for GTA VI!

review_en: This yield rate and SF2P implementation are incredible! The approaching practical application of the 2nm process holds huge potential for future smartphone and PC performance. Samsung is regaining its tech leadership!
title_en: Samsung Achieves 50% Yield on 2nm GAA Process! Leading the Next-Gen Semiconductor Race with SF2P Technology
summary_en:
â€¢ Samsung has achieved a 50% yield on its 2nm GAA process.
â€¢ Promotion of the next-generation SF2P (second-generation 2nm GAA) technology is beginning.
â€¢ Following the success of the Exynos 2600, development of next-generation node technology is accelerating.
content_en:
Samsung Electronics has announced that it has achieved a 50% yield on its 2nm GAA (Gate-All-Around) process. This represents a significant milestone in the development of next-generation semiconductor technology. Currently, the company is working to improve yields while simultaneously initiating promotion of its second-generation 2nm GAA technology, known as SF2P. SF2P incorporates several improvements over the first-generation 2nm GAA process. Samsung has instructed its Design Solution Partners (DSPs) to prioritize the promotion of SF2P, aiming to enhance its competitiveness in the next-generation semiconductor market. The success of the Exynos 2600 is believed to be accelerating this technological development. This advancement is expected to contribute to higher performance across a wide range of fields, including smartphones and data centers.

Review (EN)

This yield rate and SF2P implementation are incredible! The approaching practical application of the 2nm process holds huge potential for future smartphone and PC performance. Samsung is regaining its tech leadership!

review_en: TSMC's lead in the AI boom is undeniable. Intel has a mountain to climb, but competition is *always* good for consumers! Hoping for cheaper next-gen CPUs & GPUs.
title_en: TSMC CEO Downplays Intel Foundry's Progress, Confident in AI Boom Advantage
summary_en:
â€¢ TSMC CEO C.C. Wei stated he is 'not worried' about the progress of Intel Foundry.
â€¢ TSMC is expanding its share in the foundry market due to increased demand in HPC and AI sectors.
â€¢ The rise of Intel Foundry signals increased competition for TSMC and potential price reductions.
content_en:
TSMC CEO C.C. Wei commented on the progress of Intel Foundry in the semiconductor sector, stating that the company has no particular concerns. TSMC currently dominates the foundry market, further solidifying its position with increasing demand from the HPC (High-Performance Computing) and AI (Artificial Intelligence) sectors. However, TSMC's current production capacity constraints are creating new opportunities for competitors such as Samsung and Intel Foundry. Internal sources suggest that simply investing capital will not be enough for Intel to catch up to TSMC, citing a significant gap in technological capabilities. Nevertheless, increased competition from Intel could lead to price reductions in next-generation products like Ryzen and GeForce, which would be beneficial for consumers.

Review (EN)

TSMC's lead in the AI boom is undeniable. Intel has a mountain to climb, but competition is *always* good for consumers! Hoping for cheaper next-gen CPUs & GPUs.

review_en: Absolutely insane specs! The Zen 5 + 3D V-Cache combo is a game-changer. The MEG X870E UNIFY-X MAX's overclocking & cooling are a dream for enthusiasts. Wi-Fi 7 & 5G LAN? ğŸ”¥
title_en: MSI Announces Next-Gen Motherboards Supporting Ryzen 7 9850X3D - Pushing the Limits of Gaming & Creation!
summary_en:
â€¢ Supports the AMD Ryzen 7 9850X3D processor, leveraging the Zen 5 architecture and 3D V-Cache technology.
â€¢ MSI's flagship model, the 'MEG X870E UNIFY-X MAX', is a high-performance motherboard designed for overclocking enthusiasts.
â€¢ Features Wi-Fi 7 and 5G LAN for fast and stable network connectivity.
content_en:
MSI has announced motherboards supporting the AMD Ryzen 7 9850X3D processor, featuring AMD's next-generation Zen 5 architecture and the latest 3D V-Cache technology. This processor boasts 8 cores, 16 threads, a total of 104MB of cache, a maximum boost clock of 5.60GHz, and a maximum TDP of 120W. It is optimized for high-performance gaming and content creation, and is expected to set a new standard for high-performance computing. Simultaneously announced, the flagship model 'MEG X870E UNIFY-X MAX' is designed for users seeking extreme overclocking, featuring a 2-DIMM layout and an OC engine. A robust 18+2+1 power phase design (110A SPS) combined with an advanced thermal solution featuring Direct Touch Cross Heat-pipe and dual-sided EZ M.2 Shield Frozr II ensures stable operation. Furthermore, the integration of cutting-edge Wi-Fi 7 and 5G LAN delivers peak efficiency for data-intensive applications and low-latency connectivity. A dedicated tuning controller simplifies overclocking adjustments and CMOS clearing.

Review (EN)

Absolutely insane specs! The Zen 5 + 3D V-Cache combo is a game-changer. The MEG X870E UNIFY-X MAX's overclocking & cooling are a dream for enthusiasts. Wi-Fi 7 & 5G LAN? ğŸ”¥

review_en: Seriously impressive specs! A half tenkey on a 40% board is a brilliant idea. The low-profile design and aluminum case are a perfect combo of style and durability. The split spacebar might take getting used to, but the overall customization makes this keyboard incredibly appealing. Group buy, here I come!
title_en: CannonKeys Unveils 'Bullet Train' â€“ 40% Keyboard with Half Tenkey, Compact & High-Performance!
summary_en:
â€¢ CannonKeys has announced the 'Bullet Train,' a uniquely designed mechanical keyboard.
â€¢ It features a 40% layout with a half tenkey, offering both compactness and high usability.
â€¢ Equipped with wired/wireless connectivity, hot-swap support, and an aluminum case, it's ideal for gaming.
content_en:
CannonKeys, known for its uniquely designed mechanical keyboards such as the 'Minimi40' themed around lunchboxes, has announced the 'Bullet Train.' This keyboard inherits the company's design aesthetic while further evolving its functionality. It adopts the 'V4N4G0N' layout, featuring a 40% layout with a half tenkey, effectively utilizing limited space while still providing the convenience of a tenkey. The case is made of aluminum and features a low-profile design, resulting in a stylish appearance. The default plate is made of FR4 to ensure wireless signal integrity, but aluminum and PC plates are also available as options. It supports both wired and wireless connections, with Bluetooth for wireless and QMK firmware for the wired version. Hot-swap support allows for easy replacement of various switches, including Gateron KS-33 (low-profile V2) switches. The typing angle is 0 degrees, and the spacebar features a split design. It is available in five colors: black, dark green, lilac, pink, and silver. Group buy starts on February 5th, with the wired version starting at $170 (approximately Â¥26,860) and the wireless version at $200 (approximately Â¥31,600). Keycaps and switches are sold separately, but CannonKeys is considering offering compatible keycap and switch bundles.

Review (EN)

Seriously impressive specs! A half tenkey on a 40% board is a brilliant idea. The low-profile design and aluminum case are a perfect combo of style and durability. The split spacebar might take getting used to, but the overall customization makes this keyboard incredibly appealing. Group buy, here I come!

title_en: Monster Hunter Wild Performance Issues Potentially Linked to DLC Checks! Mod Achieves Up to 75% Improvement!
summary_en:
â€¢ The performance issues plaguing 'Monster Hunter Wild' are suspected to be caused by a process constantly checking for owned DLC content.
â€¢ Accounts with more DLC owned appear to experience less performance degradation.
â€¢ Disabling the DLC check via mod has resulted in up to a 75% performance increase on mid-range PCs.
content_en:
Since its release, 'Monster Hunter Wild' has faced criticism regarding performance and optimization, despite improvements through updates. A recent investigation by Reddit users suggests that the game's process of checking for DLC content ownership may be contributing to performance issues. Testing revealed that Capcom appears to be constantly verifying DLC ownership in the background, potentially impacting performance. Notably, accounts with a larger number of DLC titles owned exhibited less performance degradation. Furthermore, disabling this DLC check using a mod resulted in a significant performance increase of up to 75% on mid-range PCs. Whether this check is intentional or a bug remains unclear, but the lack of a fix in post-launch patches suggests Capcom is likely aware of the issue. Further performance improvements are scheduled for 2026, and users have expressed intent to release the mod if Capcom does not address the problem. This mod could be a game-changer for many players.

Review (EN)

75% performance boost?! That's HUGE! Capcom needs to address this ASAP. Huge props to the modder!

title_en: Schenker Element 16: Ultimate Customization! Next-Gen Gaming PC Revealed
summary_en:
â€¢ Schenker has announced the 'Element 16' gaming laptop, featuring high upgradeability and repairability.
â€¢ It will be powered by an Intel Core Ultra 7 356H CPU and support up to 64GB of RAM.
â€¢ A modular design including the keyboard, port module, and motherboard allows for easy future upgrades.
content_en:
Schenker has announced the 'Element 16' gaming laptop, prioritizing upgradeability and repairability. Developed in collaboration with Intel, it is based on the latest Intel Panther Lake Core Ultra Series 3 CPU. Scheduled for release in 2026, configurations will include a Core Ultra 7 356H CPU and support up to 64GB of RAM. The Element 16â€™s key feature is its extensive customization options. In addition to commonly upgradeable components like RAM, SSD storage, fans, and the battery, the design allows tool-less access to internal parts by opening the bottom panel with minimal screws. Furthermore, the keyboard and port module are also replaceable, adopting a modular design similar to the Framework 16. Port modules are attached to the side and can be replaced collectively to modify the port configuration. While the motherboard is also replaceable, it remains unclear whether it will support both AMD and Intel CPUs. Pricing, parts availability, and the extent of parts disclosure by Schenker are yet to be announced. The laptop will be available through Bestware in the EU.

Review (EN)

Seriously impressive specs! The motherboard being replaceable is a game-changer for future upgrades. The Framework 16-style modularity is a huge win for users. Can't wait for the Bestware release!

title_en: Major Verizon Outage: iPhones Display 'SOS' as Communication Services Fail
summary_en:
â€¢ A major outage is impacting Verizon, leaving iPhone users unable to make calls, send SMS messages, or use data services.
â€¢ The outage causes iPhones to display 'SOS' in the status bar, indicating a loss of connection to the carrier network.
â€¢ Verizon has promised compensation to affected customers, with details to be announced later.
content_en:
Today, a major outage has occurred at Verizon, a US telecommunications carrier. As a result of this outage, iPhone users utilizing Verizon services are unable to use basic communication functions such as making calls, sending SMS messages, and using 5G/LTE data services. The display of 'SOS' in the iPhone status bar indicates a loss of connection to the carrier network, a very rare occurrence outside of emergency situations. Verizon has promised to compensate all customers affected by this outage, with specific details to be announced at a later date. Restoration efforts are currently underway around the clock, and an early recovery is anticipated.

Review (EN)

Honestly, a major outage at a key US carrier is shocking. It highlights vulnerabilities in their communication infrastructure. Hoping for a swift recovery from Verizon and sincere compensation for customers.

title_en: Major Leak: 'Forza Horizon 6' Release Date Potentially Revealed - May 19th?
summary_en:
â€¢ A pre-order popup for 'Forza Horizon 6' has been discovered within 'Forza Horizon 5'.
â€¢ The release date is suggested to be May 15th for early access and May 19th for the official launch.
â€¢ The game boasts over 550 vehicles, the most in the series, and an expansive open world.
content_en:
Today, a report by @XBOXF10 on X (formerly Twitter) revealed that a pre-order popup for 'Forza Horizon 6' has appeared within 'Forza Horizon 5'. This popup indicates early access from May 15th for four days, with an official release date of May 19th. Pre-order bonuses include two additional expansion packs, a welcome pack, VIP membership, Car Pass, and Time Attack Car Pass. Furthermore, a specially tuned Ferrari J50 will also be available. As confirmed by screenshots, the game features over 550 vehicles â€“ the most in the series â€“ and the largest open world ever seen in a Forza title. The dedication of the development team is truly evident.

Review (EN)

These specs are insane! Over 550 cars... the possibilities are endless. Can't wait to explore that massive open world. The Ferrari J50 bonus is a huge plus, and I'm definitely grabbing early access. Time to upgrade my PC!

title_en: Safari Technology Preview 235 Released: Support for macOS Sequoia/Tahoe! Get a Sneak Peek at the Next-Gen Safari
summary_en:
â€¢ Safari Technology Preview 235 has been released.
â€¢ It supports macOS Sequoia and macOS Tahoe, allowing a wide range of users to participate in testing.
â€¢ Improvements are included in key web technologies such as CSS, JavaScript, and WebAssembly.
content_en:
Apple today released the latest update, version 235, of Safari Technology Preview, its experimental browser. This preview version is designed for testing features planned for future versions of the Safari browser. The update includes fixes and improvements across a wide range of areas, including CSS, Canvas, Clipboard, Editing, Encoding, Forms, HTML, JavaScript, MathML, Media, Networking, Rendering, SVG, Web APIs, WebAssembly, and WebRTC. Notably, it now supports the latest macOS versions, Sequoia and Tahoe. This allows a larger number of developers and enthusiastic users to be among the first to test the next-generation Safari features. The update is easily installed through the system preferences or system settings software update mechanism for users who have downloaded Safari Technology Preview. Detailed release notes are available on the Safari Technology Preview website. Apple aims to collect valuable feedback from developers and users through this preview version to further evolve the Safari browser.

Review (EN)

macOS Sequoia/Tahoe support is HUGE! Excited to see WebAssembly improvements and get a first look at the next Safari. Can't wait to test the bug fixes and performance gains. Love Safari's design & usability â€“ hyped for future updates!

title_en: Robotic Revolution in Cell Therapy: Over 70% Cost Reduction to Accelerate Future Healthcare!
summary_en:
â€¢ Multiply Labs is revolutionizing cell therapy manufacturing processes by introducing robotic technology into cleanrooms.
â€¢ Achieves over 70% cost reduction compared to conventional systems, accelerating production volume.
â€¢ Increased efficiency and cost reduction in cell therapy have the potential to enable access for more patients.
content_en:
Multiply Labs, in collaboration with cell therapy companies, is bringing significant transformation to the manufacturing process of cell therapies by introducing robotic technology into cleanrooms. This innovative approach has resulted in over 70% cost reduction and a substantial acceleration of production volume compared to conventional systems. Cell therapy holds great promise for the treatment of intractable diseases, but its high manufacturing costs have hindered widespread adoption. This robotic implementation significantly reduces the cost of cell therapy, potentially enabling more patients to access this treatment. Further advancements in automation within the healthcare sector are anticipated.

Review (EN)

Over 70% cost reduction is incredible! This is a game-changer for cell therapy accessibility. Major pharma needs to jump on this â€“ the future of healthcare is here!

review_en: Huge news! NVIDIA & Lilly teaming up for AI drug discovery is a game-changer. This could drastically accelerate the development of life-saving medicines. #AI #DrugDiscovery #NVIDIA #Lilly
title_en: NVIDIA and Lilly Team Up for AI-Powered Drug Discovery: A Potential Revolution in Healthcare?
summary_en:
â€¢ NVIDIA's Jensen Huang and Lilly's Dave Ricks announced a collaboration focused on AI-driven drug discovery.
â€¢ Both companies anticipate that AI will accelerate the drug discovery process and enable more efficient development of new medicines.
â€¢ This partnership has the potential to promote the use of AI in the healthcare industry and lead to the development of groundbreaking therapies.
content_en:
NVIDIA and Lilly announced a strategic partnership focused on AI-powered drug discovery at the J.P. Morgan Healthcare Conference in San Francisco. NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang and Lilly CEO Dave Ricks discussed how AI can transform the entire drug discovery process, enabling faster and more effective development of new medicines. Both companies believe that AI can streamline each stage of drug discovery, including target identification, compound design, and clinical trial optimization. Through this partnership, Lilly aims to leverage NVIDIA's AI platform and expertise to increase the speed and success rate of new drug development. This news underscores the significant impact AI is having on the healthcare industry and future developments are highly anticipated.

Review (EN)

Huge news! NVIDIA & Lilly teaming up for AI drug discovery is a game-changer. This could drastically accelerate the development of life-saving medicines. #AI #DrugDiscovery #NVIDIA #Lilly
